These are the xml strings. Arrowverse Quiz Welcome to the Arrowverse Quiz! Image header for Quiz. Image header for Arrow questions. Image header for Flash questions. Image header for Legends of Tomorrow questions. Image header for Supergirl questions. Image for bonus question toast message. Player Name Type name here. 1. Oliver Queen was lost on the island for 5 years. True or False. True False 2. What is Vibe\'s full name? Francisco Reynaldo Cisco Ramon Fred Savage Francisco Ramon Answer Here 3. Who are not Team Arrow members? Wild Dog Overwatch Black Canary John Diggle 4. Who is the captain of the WaveRider? Answer Here 5. Who is Kaitlyn Snow\'s alter ego? Mr. Freeze Captain Cold Killer Frost Frosty
6. Which heroes are DEO members? Supergirl Cat Grant Jimmy Olson J\'onn J\'onzz 7. Rip Hunter is a Time Lord? True or False. True False 8. What was the name of the universe that was created when Barry saved his mother? Submit Bonus Question What other TV show did Joe West star in? NCIS Law and Order: SVU Law and Order L.A. Law That\'s Right!!!
These are the java strings. Sara Lance The Flashpoint Paradox got out of 8 answers correct!
